hadiths.text: It was narrated that Tariq Al-Muharibi said:“I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) raising his hands until I saw the whiteness of his armpits, saying: 'No child should be punished because of his mother's crime, no child should be punished because of his mother's crime.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَجْنِي أَحَدٌ عَلَى أَحَدٍ
chapter.eng-name: No Criminal Can Bring Punishment Upon Anyone Else (For His Crime)
